{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21756v1", "title": "Ends of the strata of differentials", "summary": "We enumerate the ends of each stratum of meromorphic 1-forms on Riemann
surfaces with prescribed multiplicities of zeroes and poles. Our proof uses
degeneration techniques based on the construction by
Bainbridge-Chen-Gendron-Grushevsky-Moeller of the moduli space of multi-scale
differentials, together with recent classification of connected components of
generalized strata by Lee-Wong. In particular, from these results we quickly
deduce the theorem for holomorphic 1-forms, originally proved by Boissy.", "main_category": "math.GT", "categories": "math.GT,math.AG,math.DS", "published": "2025-04-30T15:54:50Z"}
